messages.title: We're backing James Blanchard and the Lib Dem FOCUS team
messages.content: Lib Dems work hard for us - you never see the others. Don't waste your vote - Labour can't win in York Outer. You just can't believe a word the Tories say any more.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lib Dems pledge to boost forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have pledged to keep defence spending in line with NATO commitments and maintain Trident. They also support wounded troops and veterans.
James Blanchard calls for an extra £6bn per year for the NHS, with £1bn for social care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lib Dems investing in frontline services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Efforts to protect and invest in crucial frontline services despite unprecedented cuts. Planning to put an extra £800,000 into the drainage budget.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Outcry at Tory Social Care plans
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservative social care policy criticized as a 'tax on illness'. It will hit the old and vulnerable the hardest.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Don't waste your vote - Labour can't win in York Outer.
